mapper.select: select distinct(sm.from_user_id) , count(sm.from_user_id), count(sm2.secret_message_id) as un_mess_num, u.user_id, u.nick_name, u.user_head_photo from secret_message as sm left join user as u on sm.from_user_id = u.user_id left join (select * from secret_message where is_see=0 and to_user_id=#{toUser.userId}) as sm2 on sm.secret_message_id=sm2.secret_message_id where sm.to_user_id=#{toUser.userId} group by sm.from_user_id order by un_mess_num desc;

select sm.*, f.user_id, f.user_head_photo, f.nick_name from secret_message as sm left join user as f on sm.from_user_id=f.user_id left join user as t on sm.to_user_id=t.user_id where f.user_id=#{fromUser.userId} and t.user_id=#{toUser.userId} and sm.is_see=0 order by sm.message_create_time desc;

select sm.*, f.user_id, f.user_head_photo, f.nick_name from secret_message as sm left join user as f on sm.from_user_id=f.user_id left join user as t on sm.to_user_id=t.user_id where ((f.user_id=#{fromUser.userId} and t.user_id=#{toUser.userId}) or (f.user_id=#{toUser.userId} and t.user_id=#{fromUser.userId})) order by sm.message_create_time asc;
